contact.title: Contact info
contact.description: You can change view and change your contact info here

delete_user.title: Delete accoount
delete_user.description: Account deletion deletes all account-related data from the system. This action cannot be undone.

request_data.title: Request data
request_data.description: After requesting data, in a few days you will receive an email containing all the data the system has collected about you.
